description: With the Scheduled trigger, you can initiate customized workflows at specific time intervals.
name: schedule

triggers.componentDescription: With the Scheduled trigger, you can initiate customized workflows at specific time intervals.

triggers.name: everyDay

properties.name: timezone

triggers.componentDescription: With the Scheduled trigger, you can initiate customized workflows at specific time intervals.

triggers.description: Trigger off based on a custom schedule.
